S.FORM: nengi ta. siangatu pa ita ti.
qiRi ka! subat!
patudan nengi isu.
qadded ka.
nengi ta. setangi tud pa patudan tu sikawman na kebalan saqanan naqunian ta sumanu.
S.TRANSL: 大家好。今天老師要教大家食物的噶瑪蘭語語怎麼說。
Hello everyone. Today I am going to teach you how to say Kavalan language for food.

S.FORM: suppaR isu mipil tu sikawman na patudan ni?
S.TRANSL: Do you understand what the teacher says?

S.FORM: patudan, Rayngu iku. qanengi isu semanu qaqelisa ni?
S.TRANSL: 老師，我不懂。可以再說一次嗎?
I don’t understand. Can you repeat it again?

S.FORM: mai qaipil ku, qanengi qaRayan tu kitut suni ni?
S.TRANSL: 我聽不到，可以大聲一點嗎?
I can’t hear you, can you speak louder?

S.FORM: tayta ika zau! qasulun iku meliyam kelisa.
S.TRANSL: 請看這裡! 跟著我唸一遍。
Look here, please! Repeat after me.

S.FORM: nengi niliyaman.
uman ka meliyam qakelisa. qaRaya ika meliam tu kiya.
S.TRANSL: Read it again. Please speak louder.

S.FORM: qalimek ka. naRin sikawma.
pazukat ka tu sudad.
en, patudan.
pazukat ka tu bilu.
patudan, kalingun ti iku mazas tu bilu.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my pen.

S.FORM: pazukat ka tu sasupasan.
patudan, kalingun ti iku mazas tu sasupasan.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my eraser.

S.FORM: liway ka tu ta kinilan ay kaput tu sasupasan.
S.TRANSL: 請跟旁邊同學借橡皮擦。
Please borrow erasers from your classmates.

S.FORM: paliway iku tu sasupasan qanengi ni?
sanga pa ita ti temaqsi.
tuzus pa ita tu tazian temaqsi, muman lipayan qawka muman simtayta.
S.TRANSL: 我們就上到這邊，下週再見。
Class dismissed, see you next week.

S.FORM: tiana isu?
ti utay aiku.
tiana isu?
sunis ni utay aiku, ti buya nangan ku.
S.TRANSL: I'm Utay's son, my name is buya.

S.FORM: tiana isu?
pataqsian ni buya aiku, ti utay nangan ku.
S.TRANSL: I'm a student in Buya, and my name is Utay.

S.FORM: tiana nangan su?
ti utay nangan ku.
tiana nangn na tama su?
ti utay nangan na tama ku.
tiana aizipna?
ti utay aizipna.
qaqa ku aizip na, ti utay nangan na.
S.TRANSL: He's my brother, his name is Utay.

S.FORM: tiana nangan na?
ti buli nangan na.
ti buya nangan na ni?
en, ti buya nangan na.
ti utay nangan na ni?
ussa, ti buya nangan na.
tiana lazat ’nay?
ti pipis aizipna. tina ku aizipna.
tiana lazat ’nay?
kaput ku aizipna, ti imuy nangan na.
S.TRANSL: 她是我的朋友，她的名字是imuy。
She's my friend, her name is Imuy.

S.FORM: utani ti tasaw su setangi?
Rabetin ta tasaw ku setang.
utani ti tasaw na setangi?
Rabetin yau uzusa ti tasaw na setangi.
utani ti tasaw na tama su setangi?
uluma betin ti tasaw na tama ku setangi.
kintani aimu nansuani?
S.TRANSL: How many brothers and sisters do you have?

S.FORM: yau kinnawsa qaqa ku, paqenanem suani ku.
S.TRANSL: 我有兩個兄姐，一個弟妹。
I have two brothers and sisters and one younger brother and sister.

S.FORM: yau kinnawsa qaqa su ni?
mai iku tu qaqa.
kintani aimu saleppawan?
S.TRANSL: How many people are in your family?

S.FORM: kinsepat aimi saleppawan.
S.TRANSL: There are four of us in our family.

S.FORM: yau isu tanian temaqsi?
yau iku ta kalingkuan temaqsi.
tiana aizipna?
tama ku aizipna.
niana qakelawlawayan na tama su?
S.TRANSL: 你的舅舅從事什麼工作?
What does your uncle do for a living?

S.FORM: tayzin aizipna.
tiana lazat ’nay?
qaqa ku aizipna.
kelawkaway qaqa su ni?
S.TRANSL: Does your sister have a job?

S.FORM: yau ta paisingan kelawkaway aizipna.
nansuani qaniyau kinnawsa ni?
S.TRANSL: 他們兩個人是兄弟姐妹嗎?

S.FORM: ussa, kaput ku qaniyau.
yencumin aisu ni?
en, kebalan aiku.
yencumin tisin su ni?
en, wanayka puyuma aizipna.
S.TRANSL: Yes, but she's from the Puyuma tribe.

S.FORM: ibabaw tama su ni?
en, nizu ibabaw aimi saleppawan.
S.TRANSL: Yes, we are all very tall.

S.FORM: temaqsi ti suani su ni?
S.TRANSL: Does your sister go to school?

S.FORM: en, temaqsi ti aizipna.
suppaR temankebakan suani su ni?
S.TRANSL: Do your siblings speak the language?

S.FORM: en, suppaR temankebalan qaniyau.
S.TRANSL: Yes, they speak the ethnic language.

S.FORM: kintani nansuani su?
S.TRANSL: How many brothers and sisters do you have?

S.FORM: kintulu nasuani ku.
S.TRANSL: I have three brothers and sisters.

S.FORM: matapun isu tu tama tina qemizuan ni?
S.TRANSL: 你和爸爸媽媽一起住嗎?
Do you live with your parents?

S.FORM: en, matapun iku tu tama tina ku qemizuan.
S.TRANSL: 是，我和爸爸媽媽一起住。
Yes, I live with my mom and dad.

S.FORM: matapun isu tu baqi bai qemizuan ni?
S.TRANSL: 你和爺爺奶奶一起住嗎?
Do you live with your grandparents?

S.FORM: mai, mai ku matapun ta qaniyauan qemizuan.
S.TRANSL: 不，我沒和跟他們一起住。
No, I didn't live with them.

S.FORM: tiana qatapunan su qemizuan?
matapun iku tu tama, tina, qaqa qemizuan.
S.TRANSL: 我跟爸爸、媽媽、哥哥住在一起。
I live with my father, mother and brother.

S.FORM: maqezi isu tanian mawtu?
maqezi iku ta kalingkuan mawtu.
tanian leppaw numi?
ta kalingkuan leppaw niaq.
tanian damu su?
ta kalingkuan damu ku.
tanian damu numi?
ta kalingkuan damu niaq.
qumni imu tanan sa damu?
S.TRANSL: 你什麼時候會回去部落?
When are you going back to the tribe?

S.FORM: semanga temaqsi temanan ti iku.
S.TRANSL: I will go back in the summer.

S.FORM: sunis na kebalan aiku.
naquni deddan setangi?
mezukat ti sezang, mammaq deddan.
S.TRANSL: The sun is coming out, it's very hot.

S.FORM: sessen ta tati ni?
S.TRANSL: Is it going to be cold outside?

S.FORM: sessen, qamuwaza ika siqudus.
S.TRANSL: It's cold, so wear more clothes.

S.FORM: mammaq ta tati ni?
mai, sabali ti, saRu.
naquni deddan setangi?
setangi deddan mai sessen mai mammaq qaya, simunang.
S.TRANSL: 今天不冷也不熱，很舒服。
It's neither cold nor hot today, very comfortable.

S.FORM: naquni deddan setangi qaRabi?
mai tu lanem ta deddanan, mezukat ti bultedan.
S.TRANSL: 天空沒有雲，星星出來了。
There were no clouds in the sky; the stars came out.

S.FORM: naquni deddan ta tati?
muRetik ti uzan, mezukat ti sezang, mezukat ti qeliwaRwaR.
S.TRANSL: 雨剛剛停，出了太陽，彩虹出來了。
The rain has just stopped, the sun has come out, the rainbow is coming out.

S.FORM: naquni deddan timaisuan?
S.TRANSL: What's the weather like where you are?

S.FORM: Raya bali timaimian.
S.TRANSL: We're going to have a big storm here.

S.FORM: nengi deddan timaisuan ni?
nengi, mezukat ti sezang.
S.TRANSL: Very well, out of the big sun.

S.FORM: qatiw pa iku ti taqsi.
S.TRANSL: I have to go to school.

S.FORM: sessen deddan, qamuwaza ika siqudus.
S.TRANSL: The weather is very cold, so wear more clothes.

S.FORM: lusit pa iku ti.
qaRaya uzan antangi, naRin isu kalingun mazas tu qawsua.
S.TRANSL: 等一下會下大雨，你要記得帶傘。
It's going to rain heavily, you have to remember to bring an umbrella.

S.FORM: qauzan ni?
mezengzeng ti, antangi pasi qauzan ti.
S.TRANSL: 剛剛打雷了，等一下應該就會下雨。
There was thunder just now, and it's supposed to rain later.

S.FORM: muzan ti ni?
muzan tangi, muRetik ti uzan tangi.
S.TRANSL: 剛剛有下雨，現在雨停了。
It just rained, and now it's stopped.

S.FORM: muReti ti uzan ni?
azu umuzan ti, mezizi lazan.
S.TRANSL: 好像下過雨了，馬路是濕的。
It seems to have rained and the road is wet.

S.FORM: muzan ti ni? manna niz ti isu mezizi?
S.TRANSL: 有下雨嗎?你怎麼全都濕了?
Is it raining? Why are you all wet?

S.FORM: muzan ti ta tati, mai iku siqawsua.
S.TRANSL: 外面在下雨，我沒有帶雨傘。
It's raining outside, so I didn't bring an umbrella.

S.FORM: nengi pama isu ni?
Raya bali, taRaw uRu ku siyupan.
S.TRANSL: The wind is blowing so hard that my head hurts.

S.FORM: nengi pama isu ni?
Raya sezang, lubingaw uRu ku Raysezang.
S.TRANSL: 太陽好大，曬得我頭好暈。
The sun is so big, it makes me dizzy.

S.FORM: kalingun ti iku mazas tu bilu.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my pencil.

S.FORM: paliway ya ka isu.
kalingun ti iku mazas tu ipit.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my chopsticks.

S.FORM: mai iku mazas qaya, qatiw pa ita Rasa.
S.TRANSL: I don't have one either, let's go buy one.

S.FORM: qanengi ita matiw meRasa tu bilu ni?
S.TRANSL: Let's go buy a pen, shall we?

S.FORM: kuwa ya, Rasa pama iku tu sasupasan.
S.TRANSL: Well, I still have to buy erasers.

S.FORM: qanengi ita matiw meRasa tu saqanan taRbabi ni?
S.TRANSL: Let's go get breakfast, shall we?

S.FORM: mai iku qatiw, quman ti iku ta leppawan.
S.TRANSL: I'm not going, I've eaten at home.

S.FORM: kalingun ti iku paRemaq tu ’may.
qalazuk ka matiw paRemaq!
S.TRANSL: Hurry up and heat it up!

S.FORM: kalingun ti iku mazas tu ’may.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my lunchbox.

S.FORM: nayau si qatapun pa ita qeman tu ’may ku!
S.TRANSL: 那我們一起吃我的便當吧!
Then let's eat my lunch box together!

S.FORM: qan pa isu tu niana tuttu?
S.TRANSL: What are you having for lunch?

S.FORM: qan pa iku tu saqanan na taqsian tuttu.
S.TRANSL: 我要吃學校的營養午餐。
I want a nutritious school lunch.

S.FORM: ngid isu qan tu niana tuttu?
S.TRANSL: What are you having for lunch?

S.FORM: mazas iku tu ’may setangi, qatapun pa ita qeman satuttu!
S.TRANSL: 我今天有帶便當，我們中午一起吃吧!
I've brought a lunchbox today, let's eat together at noon!

S.FORM: qanengi ita matiw mawRat tu mali ni?
S.TRANSL: Let's go play basketball, shall we?

S.FORM: nengi yu! ni qawi ita.
qanengi ita matiw pemukun tu mali ni?
qasukaw, taqsi pa iku.
panmu iku mala tu sinap.
S.TRANSL: Please help me with the broom.

S.FORM: kuwa, bula ka isu tu sinap zau.
S.TRANSL: Okay, here's a broomstick for you.

S.FORM: qanengi manmu timaikuan mala tu lawa ni?
S.TRANSL: Can you help me with the cloth?

S.FORM: yau iku seminap, qeRas ika ti utay papanmu mala.
S.TRANSL: I'm sweeping the floor, you ask Utay to help you.

S.FORM: mulepun ti isu seminap ni?
mulepun ti iku seminap.
manna mai isu seminap?
mulepun ti iku seminap.
dasam tipan ta, supas ika qakikiya.
S.TRANSL: The floor is dirty, go clean it.

S.FORM: kuwa, qatiw pa iku ala tu lawa.
S.TRANSL: Okay, I'll go get the cloth.

S.FORM: dasam ti dengat ’nay, supas ika qakikiya.
S.TRANSL: 那個窗戶很髒，去擦一下。
That window is very dirty, go clean it.

S.FORM: ansita, mai pama iku mulepun seminap tu zau.
S.TRANSL: 等一下，我還沒掃完這裡。
Wait a minute, I'm not done sweeping here yet.

S.FORM: antangi quni pa isu?
qatiw pa iku kilim tu patudan.
S.TRANSL: I'm going to see my teacher.

S.FORM: temanan temaqsi quni pa isu?
S.TRANSL: What do you do after school?

S.FORM: qasulun pa iku tu kaput matiw satezay.
S.TRANSL: I'm going to sing with my friends.

S.FORM: temanan temaqsi quni pa aizipna?
qatiw pa aizipna nanguy.
yau ti ipay ta lepawan ni?
yau ta leppawan aizipna, tuqaz ka.
S.TRANSL: She’s at home, please come in.

S.FORM: yau ti ipay ta leppawan ni?
mai aizipna, yau niana lanas su ni?
S.TRANSL: She's not here. What do you want?

S.FORM: tiana ya?
baqi, ti umus aiku, tangan ika ineb.
S.TRANSL: Grandfather, I am umus, please open the door.

S.FORM: mayni ya?
ipay, ti umus aiku, mawtu iku semaqsaqay kemilim timaisuan.
S.TRANSL: Ipay, I'm Umus and I've come to play with you.

S.FORM: tenes ti mai simtayta.
en ya! sizenges iku timaisu. qakuwa sidadaq pa ita!
S.TRANSL: 是啊!我很想念你。快我們來聊天吧!
Yeah! I've missed you. Come on, let's talk!

S.FORM: qaded ka! nanum ka!
S.TRANSL: Please sit down! Please have tea!

S.FORM: wanay.
nanum ka tu ucia!
nengi nanuman ucia numi.
qan pa ita tu suyku!
nengi yu! taytan ta suyku zau nengi.
S.TRANSL: 好喔!這些水果看起來很棒。

S.FORM: nengi qanan suyku ni?
en, maken nengi qanan.
mulepun ti meRamaz ti tina tu saRabian, qawtu ka ti qan!
S.TRANSL: 媽媽煮好晚餐了，快來吃吧!
Mom has cooked dinner, come and eat!

S.FORM: kuwa, banaw pa iku tu lima.
S.TRANSL: Okay, I'll go wash my hands.

S.FORM: padames ka qeman, ussa isu ’daq.
S.TRANSL: 盡量吃喝，你又不是外人。
Try to eat and drink as much as possible, you're not an outsider.

S.FORM: muwaza ti niqan ku, bisuR ti.
S.TRANSL: I ate a lot, I'm full.

S.FORM: qamuwaz ika qeman, naRin mesikaz.
kuwa, maken nengi qanan.
qawi ya ti iku, muman si qawtu iku temayta timaisuan.
S.TRANSL: 我要離開了，下次再來看你。
I'm leaving, I'll see you next time.

S.FORM: kuwa ya, wanay.
Rabi ti, tanan pa iku ti.
qawtu ka muman semaqsaqay yu!
paqanas ka semaqay.
kuwa, yau lawad qawtu ka saleppaw iku saqsaqay.
S.TRANSL: Okay, come to my house sometime.

S.FORM: nengi ita, setangi deddan azas pa patedan tu meniz sa damu mipil tu baqian.
S.TRANSL: 大家好，老師今天要帶大家去部落訪問耆老。
Hello everyone, today I’m taking you to the tribe to interview the elders.

S.FORM: nengi ye! qatapun pa ita tu baqian temankebalan.
S.TRANSL: 好耶!我們要跟耆老說噶瑪蘭語。

S.FORM: qaseq pa ita ti ni?
qaseq pa ti.
baqi, mawtu ti imi temayta timaisuan.
S.TRANSL: Grandpa, we’ve come to see you.

S.FORM: suppaR imu temankebalan ka! maken satuRin!
S.TRANSL: 你們會說噶瑪蘭語啊!真是太棒了!

S.FORM: nengi ita, setangi deddan azas pa patudan tu meniz qatiw sa zenna kelawkaway.
S.TRANSL: 大家好，老師今天要帶大家去稻田工作。
Hello everyone, today my teacher is going to take you to work in the rice field.

S.FORM: en, patudan
qawtu ka paylit meniz, naRin kalingun paqangi ika mazas Ribang na kelawkaway.
S.TRANSL: 大家過來排隊，記得帶好工具。
Come and line up, remember to bring your tools.

S.FORM: en, patudan, alan niaq ti Ribang na kelawkaway.
S.TRANSL: 是的，老師，我們都拿好工具了。
Yes, sir, we’ve got our tools.

S.FORM: maseq ti ita ni?
mai pama, medaud pama.
S.TRANSL: Not yet, it’s still far away.

S.FORM: kunna ka puzanum aisu.
kuwa, aiku pa puzanum.
ala ka tu sabuRawan tu adam aisu.
S.TRANSL: You go get the bird catcher.

S.FORM: kuwa, buRaw pa iku tu adam.
S.TRANSL: Okay, I’ll go and catch the birds.

S.FORM: nengi ita, qatiw pa ita sa tunguyen setangi.
S.TRANSL: 大家好，我們今天要去動物園。
Hello everyone, we are going to the zoo today.

S.FORM: nengi yu! naqunian ta pa matiw?
S.TRANSL: 好棒喔!我們要怎麼去呢?
Awesome! How are we going to get there?

S.FORM: qabasu pa ita matiw.
paylit ka meniz, pasaya pa ita Rasa tu paya.
S.TRANSL: 大家排好隊，我們準備買票。
Everyone line up, we are ready to buy tickets.

S.FORM: en.
ta ngayaw nani nizu adam ay, ta tuRuz nani nizu siqqay ay, aimu pa temayta.
S.TRANSL: 前面是鳥類，後面是蛇類，大家自己參觀。
There are birds in the front and snakes in the back.

S.FORM: patudan maytis iku tu siqqay.
quni, nayau si qatiw ka tayta tu adam aisu.
S.TRANSL: It doesn’t matter, then you go and watch the birds.

S.FORM: ussiq dukian tanan ka qalisimpu pa ita tazian.
S.TRANSL: 我們一個小時後回來集合。
We’ll be back in an hour.

S.FORM: kuwa, wanay patudan.
temayta isu tu niana setangi?
temayta iku tu muwaza siqqay, yau pama muwaza adam.
S.TRANSL: 我看到了好多蛇，還有好多鳥。
I saw a lot of snakes and a lot of birds.

S.FORM: qalazuk ka, qawi ya ti imi.
S.TRANSL: Hurry up, we have to go.

S.FORM: palana iku, pilay zapan ku.
S.TRANSL: Wait for me, my feet are tired.

S.FORM: qasulun pa ita matiw menanguy qanengi ni?
kuwa ya! ni ya!
mazemun lazat tazian menanguy.
S.TRANSL: There are a lot of people swimming here.

S.FORM: iRebeng zanum tayan, tazian pa ita menanguy nengi ti.
S.TRANSL: 那裡水很深，我們在這裡游泳就好。
The water is deep there, so we just swim here.

S.FORM: naqunian su mawtu?
semaqay iku mawtu.
mezaqis isu tu niana qitun mawtu?
S.TRANSL: What kind of car did you take?

S.FORM: qabasu iku mawtu.
naqunian su matiw ta sasubatan?
S.TRANSL: How do you go to church?

S.FORM: masulun tu tama ku pasaqay tu qitun matiw.
naqunian na matiw sa taqsian?
S.TRANSL: How does he get to school?

S.FORM: qaciyeyun aizipna matiw sa taqsian.
S.TRANSL: He took the subway to school.

S.FORM: naqunian na bai su matiw meRasa tu tamun?
S.TRANSL: How does your grandmother go to the grocery store?

S.FORM: qautubay aizipna matiw meRasa tu tamun.
S.TRANSL: She rode a motorcycle to the grocery store.

S.FORM: naqunian su matiw sa lani?
S.TRANSL: How are you going to get to Orchid Island?

S.FORM: qabawa’ iku matiw sa lani.
S.TRANSL: I want to take a boat to Lanyu.

S.FORM: naqunian na matiw sa lani?
S.TRANSL: How did he get to Orchid Island?

S.FORM: qaRikuki aizipna matiw sa lani.
S.TRANSL: He took a plane to Orchid Island.

S.FORM: niana qitun zaqisan na matiw sa kawsiyung?
S.TRANSL: What bus did he take to Kaohsiung?

S.FORM: qakawtiye aizipna matiw sa kawsiyung.
S.TRANSL: He took the THSR to Kaohsiung.

S.FORM: qagasuling aizipna matiw sa taytung ni?
S.TRANSL: Did he take a train to Taitung?

S.FORM: en, qagasuling aizipna matiw sa taytung.
S.TRANSL: Yes, he took a train to Taitung.

S.FORM: qagasuling aizipna matiw sa taytung ni?
S.TRANSL: Did he take a train to Taitung?

S.FORM: ussa, qaRikuki aizipna matiw sa taytung.
S.TRANSL: No, he took a plane to Taitung.

S.FORM: tazian yau mezaki ay teqezan na basu ni?
S.TRANSL: Is there a bus stop near here?

S.FORM: yau, pasa ngayaw ka semaqay maqayta ti teqezan na basu.
S.TRANSL: 有，往前走就會看到公車站了。
Yes, if you go straight ahead, you will see the bus stop.

S.FORM: tazian mezaki tu teqezan na ciyeyun ay tanian?
S.TRANSL: 離這裡最近的捷運站在哪裡?
Where is the nearest MRT station?

S.FORM: mai tu teqezan na ciyeyun tazian, qanengi isu mezaqis tu cicence.
S.TRANSL: 這裡沒有捷運站，你只能坐計程車。
There is no MRT station here, you can only take a taxi.

S.FORM: qabasu matiw sa taqsian qumni tuzus?
S.TRANSL: How long does it take to get to the school by bus?

S.FORM: Rabetin yau ulima tunek qaseq ti tu taqsian.
qakawtiye qatani dukian qaseq tu taycung?
S.TRANSL: 搭高鐵要多久時間會到臺中?
How long does it take to get to Taichung by THSR?

S.FORM: ussiq dukian qaseq ti tu taycung.
S.TRANSL: I will come to Taichung in an hour.

S.FORM: pasaqay tu qitun sa ulay qatenes ni?

S.FORM: Rasa pa iku tu tiRuR, yau pama?
S.TRANSL: I want some eggs too, do you have some?

S.FORM: mai ti tiRuR niaq.
Rasa pa iku tu qudus.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy some clothes.

S.FORM: naquni ay ngidan su?
S.TRANSL: What kind of clothes do you like?

S.FORM: ngid iku Rasa tu kezut tusungan ay qudus.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy the clothes with short sleeves.

S.FORM: tebaRi ay zau, naquni zin su?
yau zuma ay tamak?
yau pama busaR ay seRay deddan puli ay.
S.TRANSL: We have white and blue ones too.

S.FORM: bula iku tu ussiq deddan puli ay qudus.
S.TRANSL: 請給我一件藍色的衣服。
Please give me the clothes in blue.

S.FORM: bawki, matiw isu seni? matiw isu mundu?
S.TRANSL: bawki你剛剛去哪裡了？你去運動嗎？
bawki, where have you been just now? Did you go exercising?

S.FORM: ussa, manmu iku tu bai meRasa tu tenned.
S.TRANSL: No, I went grocery shopping for my grandma.

S.FORM: nazau si, anqaRabi yau lawad su? qasulun pa ita qan saRabi.
S.TRANSL: 這樣啊，你晚上有沒有空？要不要和我一起吃飯。
No wonder! Are you available at night? Would you like to have a meal with me?

S.FORM: Rayngu iku, Rasa pa iku tu qudus.
S.TRANSL: No, I want to buy some clothes.

S.FORM: qasulun aka aisu qatiw.
S.TRANSL: Then, I will go with you.

S.FORM: nengi isu, saputen tenned zau, utani asa na?
S.TRANSL: 你好，請問這把菜多少錢？
Hello, how much is this bunch of vegetables?

S.FORM: saputen tenned, uzusa betin asa na.
S.TRANSL: The vegetables are $20 for a bunch.

S.FORM: utani asa na qawpiR zau?
S.TRANSL: How much are these sweet potatoes?

S.FORM: salaluyan qawpiR, utulu betin asa na.
S.TRANSL: Sweet potatoes are thirty dollars for a pound.

S.FORM: bula iku tu uzusa putenan tenned zau seRay salaluyan qawpiR.
S.TRANSL: 請給我兩把菜和一斤地瓜。
Please give me two bunches of vegetables and a pound of sweet potatoes.

S.FORM: bawki, mekalingun ti iku mazas tu bilu, qanengi isu paliway timaiku?
S.TRANSL: bawki，我忘了帶筆，你可以借我嗎？
bawki, I forgot to bring my pen. Can you lend me one?

S.FORM: mai iku qaya, zani api ay zau.
S.TRANSL: I don’t have one either. This is api’s.

S.FORM: nayau si, qanengi paliway timaiku? kikiya ma, antangi patadikudan ku ti.
S.TRANSL: 那可以借我一下子嗎？我很快就還你。
Can you lend me the pen for a second? I will return to you immediately.

S.FORM: kua! ala ika!
wanay, paqayaw iku qaya muwanay ti apian.
S.TRANSL: Thank you and thank apian for me.

S.FORM: niana ngidan su?
ngid iku patadikud tu uzusa sudad zau.
S.TRANSL: I want to return these two books.

S.FORM: kua, yau pama niana ngidan su?
S.TRANSL: No problem and what else do you need?

S.FORM: liway pa iku tu utulu sudad zau.
S.TRANSL: I would like to borrow these three books.

S.FORM: pun ti. utulu ti deddanan, patadikud ika!
S.TRANSL: 好了。記得三天後要拿來還！
Sure and remember to return them after three days.

S.FORM: mai pama isu patadikud tu sasupasan ku.
S.TRANSL: You haven’t returned me the eraser.

S.FORM: patadikudan ku ti siRab.
nazau si, manna meqamai ti sasupasan ku?
S.TRANSL: 那我的橡皮擦怎麼不見了？
Then, why is my eraser missing?

S.FORM: ussa paliwayan su ti ti bawkian?
S.TRANSL: Did you lend it to bawki?

S.FORM: itta! ipil aka aizipna si!
S.TRANSL: I don’t know. I will go and ask her.

S.FORM: paliway aka sasupasan ku timaisu.
S.TRANSL: I will lend you my eraser first.

S.FORM: api, nipaliwayan ni bawki timaisu gaytu zau?
S.TRANSL: api, did bawki lend you this coat?

S.FORM: ussa, niRasan na tina ku zau.
S.TRANSL: 不是，這是我媽媽買給我的。
No, my mom bought it for me.

S.FORM: sasetaR tu zasu gaytu ni bawki.
S.TRANSL: bawki’s coat is the same as yours.

S.FORM: tengen ay gaytu na, mai sasetaR tamak niaq.
S.TRANSL: 他的外套是黑色的，我們的顏色不一樣。
His coat is black, so our colors are different.

S.FORM: api, umeliway isu tu kelisiw ni bawki?
S.TRANSL: api, did you borrow money from bawki?

S.FORM: yau, maw mengid iku patadikud timaizipana, wanayka mekalingun ti iku mazas tu kelisiw.
S.TRANSL: 有，我本來今天要還他，我忘記帶錢了。
Yes, I was supposed to return to him today, but I forgot to bring the money.

S.FORM: nayau si, qumni isu patadikud?
S.TRANSL: Then, when will you return the money?

S.FORM: temawaR patadikud aka timaizipana.
S.TRANSL: I will return to him tomorrow.

S.FORM: kua, paqayaw aka aisu semanu ti bawkian.
S.TRANSL: Okay, I will tell bawki for you.

S.FORM: mutun nani, medaiyung tu pemattu ay tikas. tiquRis nani, medaiyung tu tiwa tikas. nazau qawka.
S.TRANSL: 老鼠應該要石壓式陷阱抓，竹雞應該要套頸式陷阱抓，這樣才對。
It is correct to catch mice through rangay and catch bamboo partridges through qjiulang.

S.FORM: nazau? melisaw ti iku! saquni mai tu niqapaRan ku.
S.TRANSL: 原來是這樣？我都搞錯了！難怪我都抓不到。
No wonder! I am mistaken and that’s why I cannot catch any of them.

S.FORM: nayau si, tud aka aisu naqunian ta semangi tu nazau ay uzusa tikas.
S.TRANSL: 那我再教你怎麼製作這兩種陷阱。
Then I will teach you how to set up these two traps.

S.FORM: u! nengi! qusazui qayau pa ti qapaRan ku.
S.TRANSL: 好啊！太棒了！這樣我以後就會抓到獵物了。
Great! I will be able to catch the prey in the future.

S.FORM: qummut ti suway na bawbi, ala ika sawki ta sukuan, qatiw pa ita sa bawbi.
S.TRANSL: 田裡的草太長了，你去倉庫拿鐮刀，我們去田裡。
The grass in the fields is too tall. Go to the warehouse to take the sickle and let’s go to the fields.

S.FORM: pizian su tanian ya sawki?
ta kinilan na benuqu, semuRem ti isu ta sukuan nani, qaqayta su ti.
S.TRANSL: 在穀物乾燥簍的旁邊，你進去倉庫就會看到了。
It is next to the round basket. You will see it when you enter the warehouse.

S.FORM: mangan sawki ’nay, satawaR ka mala mangay meluzit!
S.TRANSL: 鐮刀很利，小心拿以免受傷！
Be careful and don’t get hurt. The sickle is very sharp.

S.FORM: naRin tebeRan tikas ku!
tanian tikas su?
yau ta libeng na paRin ’nay tikas ku.
S.TRANSL: 我的陷阱在那棵樹的下面。
My trap is under that tree.

S.FORM: manna suppaRan su?
yau nikisasan ku tazian, Raqana suppaRan ku tanian tikas ku.
S.TRANSL: 我在這邊有做記號，我知道我的陷阱在哪裡。
I make a mark here, so I know where my trap is.

S.FORM: sangku zau, sepawan ta ta iRuRan Raybaut.
S.TRANSL: 這是魚筌，我們放在溪邊捕魚。
This is a fish trap which we put beside the river for fishing.

S.FORM: mai tu sangku tamaimian, nizu melawis tu baut.
S.TRANSL: 我們那邊沒有魚筌，我們都用釣竿抓魚。
We don’t have any fish traps there, so we catch fish with a fishing rod.

S.FORM: mai iku mudaiyung tu paniwsan, antemawaR si, tud iku?
S.TRANSL: 我沒有用過釣竿，你下次教我好嗎？
I have never used a fishing rod before, would you mind teaching me next time?

S.FORM: kua! antemawaR qasulun pa ita melawis.
S.TRANSL: 好啊!我們下次一起去釣魚。
Sure! Let’s go fishing together next time.

S.FORM: anu nayau si, tud aka aisu naqunian ta semangi tu sangku.
S.TRANSL: I will teach you how to make a fish trap next time.

S.FORM: temingiw ti paniwsan su, pasi mala ti tu baut! qalazuk ka misis!
S.TRANSL: 你的釣竿動了，是不是有魚上鉤了！你快拉起來。
Your fishing rod is moving. Isn’t the fish on the hook? Pull it up!

S.FORM: antangi ti, suzingzingay ya bawa’. tazian iku misis tu paniwsan, ala ka tu suRuq tayan.
S.TRANSL: 等等，船太晃了。我在這邊拉釣竿，你去那邊幫我拿網子來。
Wait, the ship is rolling heavily. I am here to pull the fishing rod and you should go there to grab me the net.

S.FORM: tebes ika pasazi, panmu aka misis.
S.TRANSL: 你把魚拉到我這邊，我幫妳拉起來。
Pull the fish to my side and I will help you pull it up.

S.FORM: nengi! muwaza nialan ta tangi, puniR ti bakal ta meniz.
S.TRANSL: 太好了！今天大豐收，藤籃都裝滿了。
Great! It is a bumper crop today with full fish baskets.

S.FORM: qalazuk pa ita tanan sinapun tu Raqit.
S.TRANSL: 我們快回去和大家分享。
Let’s go back immediately and share it with everyone.

S.FORM: mawtu ti patudan.
naRin ti mawRat, qalazuk ka madded ta qaddedan.
S.TRANSL: 不要再玩了，快坐在座位上。
Stop playing and quickly sit in your seat.

S.FORM: qasikazan, tangzasan ti iku!
qalazuk ka temuqaz.
lipayan na utani setangi?
saqalima lipay setangi, hibang temawaR, qasulun lusit saqsaqay temawaR!
S.TRANSL: 今天星期五，明天放假，一起出去玩吧!
It’s Friday today, we have a day off tomorrow. Let’s go out and play together!

S.FORM: kuwaya! qatiw pa ita sa iRuR.
S.TRANSL: Great! Let’s go to the riverside.

S.FORM: lipayan na utani temawaR?
S.TRANSL: What day will it be tomorrow?

S.FORM: saqatulu lipay temawaR, temawaR qemadanan qatiw pa ita qawRat tu mali!
S.TRANSL: 明天星期三，我們明天下午去玩球吧!
Tomorrow will be Wednesday. Let’s go play ball tomorrow afternoon!

S.FORM: quni pa isu temawaR taRbabi?
S.TRANSL: What will you be doing tomorrow morning?

S.FORM: temawaR nani melipay, qasulun pa iku tu tina matiw sa kiyukay.
S.TRANSL: 明天是星期日，我要和媽媽去教會。
Tomorrow will be Sunday, I will be going to church with my mom.

S.FORM: manna ti isu?
ngid iku uti, qatiw pa iku sa siatisinan.
S.TRANSL: I feel like vomiting. I need to go to the restroom.

S.FORM: lubingaw uRu ku.
suqebqeb ka hibang aisu.
patudan, taRaw bedes ku, qatiw sa siatisinan.
S.TRANSL: 老師，我肚子痛，要去廁所。
Teacher, I have a stomachache. I need to go to the restroom.

S.FORM: kuwa, qalazuk ka matiw.
qanengi iku matiw banaw tu lima ni?
S.TRANSL: May I go wash my hands?

S.FORM: qangid ti hibang temaqsi, antangi qawka matiw.
S.TRANSL: It’s almost time for class to end. Wait a little longer.

S.FORM: patudan, taRaw uRu ku, ngid hibang qemadanan.
S.TRANSL: 老師，我頭好痛，下午要請假。
It’s almost time for class to end. Wait a little longer.

S.FORM: kuwa, satawaR ka temanan.
S.TRANSL: Okay, take care and go home.

S.FORM: patudan muman saqaussiq lipay hibang pa iku, ngid iku paqayta tu ising.
S.TRANSL: 老師我下禮拜一要請假，我要去看醫生。
Teacher, I need to take a sick leave next Monday. I have to see a doctor.

S.FORM: kuwa, qanengi ika ya izip.
yau tanian ti abas?
taRaw bedes na, yau ta siatisinan.
S.TRANSL: She has a stomachache. She’s in the restroom.

S.FORM: yau tanian ti utay?
patudan, taRaw qeluqung ni utay, hibang setangi.
S.TRANSL: Teacher, utay has a sore throat. She took a sick leave today.

S.FORM: manna mai mawtu ti abas?
maRemaq ti aizipna.
sanu ka tu tiana iku.
ti utay nalis aiku, Rabetin ti tasaw ku setangi.
S.TRANSL: My name is Utay nalis, and I’m 10 years old.

S.FORM: tiana nangan su?
ti utay nalis nangan ku.
sunis na niana cu ay aisu?
S.TRANSL: What ethnic group are you from?

S.FORM: sunis na kebalan aiku.
nizu yencumin saleppawan su ni?
S.TRANSL: 你的家人都是原住民嗎?
Are all your family members indigenous?

S.FORM: en, nizu kebalan aimi saleppawan.
S.TRANSL: 是的，我們全家都是噶瑪蘭族人。
Yes, my whole family is Kebalan.

S.FORM: nizu yencumin saleppawan su ni?
S.TRANSL: 你的家人都是原住民嗎?
Are all your family members indigenous?

S.FORM: ussa, kebalan ya tama ku, busus ya tina ku.
S.TRANSL: 不是，我的爸爸是噶瑪蘭族，我的媽媽是閩南人。
No, my father is Kebalan, and my mother is Hakien.

S.FORM: tiana sunis aisu?
sunis ni buya batu aiku.
mayni tama su? utani ti tasaw na?
S.TRANSL: 那位是你爸爸嗎? 他幾歲了?
Is that your father? How old is he?

S.FORM: unem betin ti tasaw na.
tama su tiyau ni? utani ti tasaw na?
S.TRANSL: 那位是你爸爸嗎? 他幾歲了?
Is that your father? How old is he?

S.FORM: ussa, baqian na damu niaq aizipna, uwalu betin ti tasaw na.
S.TRANSL: 不是，他是我們部落的耆老，他80歲了。
No, he is an elder of our tribe. He is 80 years old.

S.FORM: utani ti tasaw na qaqa su?
Rabetin yau uwalu ti tasaw na qaqa ku.
Raya tu muwaza tasaw na qaqa su timaisuan ni?
S.TRANSL: 你哥哥年紀比你大很多嗎?
Is your brother much older than you?

S.FORM: ulima tasaw qenatanaq niaq.
utani qenaibabaw su?
Rasibu yau usepat betin qenaibabaw ku.
tenes ti ita mai simtayta, ibabaw ti isu muman ni?
S.TRANSL: 好久不見，你是不是長高了?
I haven’t seen you in a while. Have you grown taller?

S.FORM: en ya, Rasibu yau utulu betin ti qenaibabaw ku.
missi ti isu ni?
mai, melisaw nitayta su.
qiwat ti isu ni?
mai, missi ti iku.
missi ti isu ni?
maqezaq, utulu betin ti laluyan aiku setangi.
qatiw pa isu tanian?
qatiw pa iku ta qizuanan na patudan kilim tu patudan.
S.TRANSL: I’m going to the office to see the teacher.

S.FORM: qatiw pa tanian ti anu?
qatiw pa baqsiw tu RusRus aizipna.
S.TRANSL: He’s going to throw away the trash.

S.FORM: yau tanian ti anu?
yau ta nanguyan aizipna, antangi simsuqas pa menanguy aizipna.
S.TRANSL: 他在游泳池，他等一下要比賽游泳。
He’s at the swimming pool. He’s going to compete in a swimming competition later.

S.FORM: yau tanian ti api? antangi simsuqas pa meRaRiw aizipna.
S.TRANSL: Api在哪裡?她等一下要比賽跑步。
Where is Api? She’s going to compete in a running competition later.

S.FORM: yau ta qizuanan na mazeun, qatiwan ku pa qumRas aizipna.
S.TRANSL: She’s in the auditorium. I’ll go call her.

S.FORM: qasulun pa ita matiw ta unduqayan ka.
S.TRANSL: Let’s go to the playground together.

S.FORM: kunna pa iku Rasa tu satuttuan, antangi qatiw kilim timaisuan.
S.TRANSL: 我先去買午餐，等一下去找你。
I’ll go buy lunch first, and then I’ll meet you later.

S.FORM: qasulun pa ita matiw misis tu ’may ka!
S.TRANSL: Let’s carry the lunch boxes together!

S.FORM: kilim ka tu ’daq aisu, qatiw pa iku kilim tu patudan.
S.TRANSL: 你找別人，我要去找老師。
You find someone else, I’m going to find the teacher.

S.FORM: setangi simsuqas pa tumkuk tu mali ti anu ni?
S.TRANSL: Is Anu competing in croquet today?

S.FORM: mai, simsuqas pa tu medutiq aizipna.
S.TRANSL: No, he’s competing in high jump.

S.FORM: undukay deddan ’nay zukat isu simsuqas ni?
S.TRANSL: 運動會那天你會上場比賽嗎?
Will you compete in the sports day?

S.FORM: qayau, qangid iku simsuqas meRaRiw.
undukay deddan ’nay qayau isu zukat simsuqas ni?
S.TRANSL: 運動會那天你會上場比賽嗎?
Will you compete in the sports day?

S.FORM: qayau iku simsuqas tumkuk tu mali.
undukay deddan ’nay quni pa ita?
S.TRANSL: 我們運動會那天要做甚麼?
What will we do in the sports day?

S.FORM: simsuqas pa ita simtebes tu Rais.
S.TRANSL: We will compete in tug of war.

S.FORM: undukay ita baliw pa tu qaqanan ni?
S.TRANSL: 我們運動會要賣食物嗎?
Will we sell food at the sports day?

S.FORM: ussa, baliw pa ita tu kikuya.
mala isu tu saqayau ay nangan ye, maken satuRin!
S.TRANSL: 你獲得了第一名耶，真是厲害！
Congratulations on getting first place! You’re amazing!

S.FORM: wanay.
yau ta leppawan ti bai ni?
yau, yau ta qinpanan maynep aizipna.
S.TRANSL: Yes, she’s sleeping in her room.

S.FORM: yau ta leppawan ti bai ni?
mai, Rulusit aizipna, qaRabi qawka tanan.
S.TRANSL: 不在，她剛出去了，要晚上才回家。
No, she’s not. She just went out and will be back in the evening.

S.FORM: yau ta leppawan ti baqi ni?
yau ta saqazusa maletuttut, tuqaz ka aisu kilim timaizipana.
S.TRANSL: 他在二樓，你上去找他吧。
He’s upstairs. You can go up and find him.

S.FORM: yau lazat ta leppawan ni?
ti aki ka, tenes ti mai temayta timaisuan, nengi isu ni?
S.TRANSL: 是Aki阿，很久沒有看到你了，你好嗎?
It’s Aki. I haven’t seen you in a while! How have you been?

S.FORM: nengi ti yu! mawtu iku kemilim timaisuan sidadak.
S.TRANSL: I’m doing great! I came to chat with you.

S.FORM: yau tanian tama su?
yau ta sammayan maRtik tu tamun, qeRasan ku pa aizipna.
S.TRANSL: 他在廚房炒菜，我去叫他。
He’s in the kitchen cooking. Let me go call him.

S.FORM: matiw seni ti umus?
matiw sa Rupu na taquq aizipna qemapaR tu taquq.
S.TRANSL: She went to the chicken coop to catch chickens.

S.FORM: baqi, mawtu ti imi.
mai baqi numi ta leppawan, yau ta zennan aizipna, ta leppawan ka aimu melana tu tananan na.
S.TRANSL: 你們的爺爺不在家，他在田裡，你們在家等他回來吧。
Your grandfather is not at home. He’s in the field. Wait for him to come back.

S.FORM: tama mawtu ti isu ka!
tenes mai simtayta, ibabaw ti isu.
S.TRANSL: I haven’t seen you in a while. You’ve grown taller.

S.FORM: qalizaqan temayta tu mawtu isu.
S.TRANSL: It’s so good to see you.

S.FORM: sabulan timaimuan unglay zau, seppaw ika ta suRena ay qabtuanan.
S.TRANSL: 這是給你們的鳳梨，要放到冰箱裡。
Here’s a pineapple for you. Put it in the refrigerator.

S.FORM: tenes tu nazau mai mawtu, tingaRan ku pa meniz tu qawtuan qeman.
S.TRANSL: 這麼久沒來，我叫大家一起來吃飯。
It’s been a while. Let’s have a meal together.

S.FORM: naRin ti paqelabut, menanum ti iku tu ucia nengi ti, qawtu pa ita sa temunaw sidadak.
S.TRANSL: 不用麻煩了，我喝茶就好，我們來客廳聊天。
No need to bother. I’ll just have tea. Let’s sit in the living room and chat.

S.FORM: wanay tu nipasipen su, tanan pa iku ti.
S.TRANSL: 謝謝你的招待，我要回去了。
Thank you for your hospitality. I have to go now.

S.FORM: Ru’tung taquq zau, azas ika patanan paqanas ika qeman aisu.
S.TRANSL: 這隻雞剛殺好，你帶回去慢慢吃。
This chicken was just freshly killed. Take it home and enjoy it slowly.

S.FORM: temawaR qemadanan aiku seRay aisu simtayta nengi ni?
S.TRANSL: 我和您約明天下午好嗎?
Can I make an appointment with you tomorrow afternoon?

S.FORM: qanengi, tanian pa ita simtayta?
ta taqsian pa ita simtayta nengi ni? paningu pa ita.
S.TRANSL: 我們約學校好嗎?我們要錄影。
How about meeting at school? We need to shoot a video.

S.FORM: nayau qatiw sa siwRatan nengi ti, siqudus pa iku tu qudus na kebalan matiw.
S.TRANSL: 那去聚會所好了，我會穿族服去。
Then let’s go to the community center. I’ll wear folk costume.

S.FORM: tepuwaq sakula na damu niaq Rubatang. palana ka tu tepuwaqan qawka isu kemilim timaikuan!
S.TRANSL: 我們部落的櫻花盛開很漂亮。等花開的時候你來找我吧!
The cherry blossoms in our tribe are beautiful when they bloom. Come find me when the flowers bloom!

S.FORM: nayau palana tu samulayan, mengasan ti ka!
S.TRANSL: 那要等到春天，太晚了吧!
That would have to wait until spring. It’s too late, isn’t it?

S.FORM: nayau ta qatabanan qawtu ka!
S.TRANSL: 那你豐年祭的時候來吧!
Then come during our Harvest Festival!

S.FORM: kuwaya! qapalanan ku!
S.TRANSL: Alright! I’m looking forward to it!

S.FORM: sanu ka manna ngid isu qatalin sa damu qemizuan?
S.TRANSL: 請問你為甚麼要搬回部落生活?
May I ask why you decided to move back to the tribe?

S.FORM: tanan pa iku Rapatudan.
S.TRANSL: I want to return to teach at the local school.

S.FORM: manna mai isu ta tukayan Rapatudan?
S.TRANSL: 為甚麼不在都市教書(當老師)?
Why not teach in the city?

S.FORM: sizenges iku tu damu ku, maRengad iku tu qanengi manmu tu damu qaya.
S.TRANSL: 因為我懷念我的故鄉，也希望能回饋部落。
Because I miss my hometown and I also want to give back to the tribe.

S.FORM: suppaR isu tumnun, tiana temud timaisuan?
S.TRANSL: 你很會織布，是誰教你的?
You’re very skilled at weaving, who taught you?

S.FORM: bai ku, ta damuan niaq mesuppaR tumnun ay lazat aizipna.
S.TRANSL: 是我的奶奶，她是我們部落最會織布的人。
It was my grandmother, she is the most skilled weaver in our tribe.

S.FORM: manna ngid isu sinanam tumnun?
S.TRANSL: How did you develop an interest in learning weaving?

S.FORM: tumnun nani wawaway niaq, kasianem tu mai pa meRapungus ya wawaway niaq
S.TRANSL: 織布是我們的文化，我想要讓文化延續。
Weaving is a part of our culture, and I want to ensure its continuity.

S.FORM: nengi qanan isi zau.
aiku semangi ay yu!
maken satuRin isu, qatenes semangi tu zau ni?
S.TRANSL: 你真厲害，這要釀很久嗎?
You’re really talented. Does it take a long time to make?

S.FORM: mai, qaussiq lipayan nengi ti. yau a nisuRan ti zinmet lumuzan ta pamanmin saRazinan, Razing zau paRamesan tu meti ay zimmet qemudiqud, qanengi ti sepezan ta puduqan.
S.TRANSL: 不用，大約一周就好了。把浸泡的糯米先蒸熟製作麴菌，麴菌和生糯米攪拌，就可以裝到甕裡了。
No, it only takes about a week. Steam the soaked glutinous rice to make koji fungus. Stir the koji fungus with the raw glutinous rice and put it into the urn.

S.FORM: yau niana nibaliwan su?
yau sidi’ seRay dukiyu ku zau, nizu aiku meluma ay yu!
S.TRANSL: 我這裡有辣椒和蕗蕎，都是我自己種的喔!
I have chili and lokiy, both grown by myself!

S.FORM: nizan meRasa uzusa utani kelisiw?
uzusa Rasibu yau ulima betin meniz.
melizaq iku tu zau qudus, utani kelisiw?
S.TRANSL: 我喜歡這件衣服，多少錢?
I like this piece of clothing. How much is it?

S.FORM: ulima Rasibu kelisiw zau.
siRis dames, qanengi qasaizan tu kiya ni?
S.TRANSL: 太貴了，不能便宜一些嗎?
It’s too expensive. Can’t you lower the price a bit?

S.FORM: qasukaw, mesaiz dames qasipun ti iku.
S.TRANSL: No, if I lower it further, I’ll lose money.

S.FORM: kuwaya! nayau si ngid iku tu ussiq tengen ay qudus.
S.TRANSL: 好吧!那我要一件黑色的衣服。
Alright then, I’ll take a black piece of clothing.

S.FORM: ngid iku tu zau Rabis seRay pilit.
S.TRANSL: 我要這把刀和這個鍋子。
I want this knife and this pot.

S.FORM: uzusa melalazan kelisiw meniz, qenaliman ku senangian zau, maken qanengi daiyngan tu qatenes.
S.TRANSL: 總共2000元，這是我自己手工打造的，保證可以用很久。
It’s a total of 2000 dollars. I handmade these, and they are guaranteed to last a long time.

S.FORM: paqsuppaR iku tu kaput qawtuan meRasa, qanengi qasaizan tu kiya ni?
S.TRANSL: 我介紹朋友來買，可以再便宜一些嗎?
I’ll introduce my friend to buy. Can you give a further discount?

S.FORM: kuwaya! qasaizan ku pa tu kiya baliw timaisuan.
S.TRANSL: 好啦!賣便宜一點點給你。

S.FORM: qawtu ka temayta yu! baliw tu qudus kubu nizu yau.
S.TRANSL: 來看看喔!衣服帽子都有賣。
Come and take a look! We sell clothes and hats.

S.FORM: ngid iku pasanu timaisuan utani kelisiw qudus zau?
S.TRANSL: 我請問你這件衣服多少錢?

S.FORM: ussiq qudus utulu Rasibu yau ulima betin kelisiw, utulu qudus ussiq melalazan kelisiw.
S.TRANSL: One piece of clothing is 350 dollars, three pieces for 1000 dollars.

S.FORM: Rasa pa iku tu ussiq nengi ti, bula iku tu tasu ay.
S.TRANSL: 我買一件就好了，請給我新的。
I’ll just buy one piece, please give me a new one.

S.FORM: nengi isu, ngid iku Rasa tu senapuwaR seRay niRamazan tu imus ay ’si.
S.TRANSL: 你好，我想要買糯米飯和山胡椒滷肉。
Hello, I would like to buy sticky rice and braised pork with maqaw pepper.

S.FORM: niz ti mabaliw. yau pama ya sani ay yupin, ngid isu Rasa ni?
S.TRANSL: 飯賣完了。我還有刺蔥油餅，你要買嗎?
The rice is sold out. I have tana pancakes, would you like to buy them?

S.FORM: kuwaya! bula iku qaussiq, muman si qawka iku Rasa tu ’may.
S.TRANSL: 好吧!請給我一份，我下次再來買飯。
Alright, please give me one. I’ll come back next time to buy rice.

S.FORM: kuwa, panmuan ku pa isu sepez ta lubusan, ulima betin nazau.
S.TRANSL: W：好，我幫你用袋子裝起來，這樣50元。
Okay, I’ll pack it in a bag for you. That’ll be 50 dollars.
